basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: This scholarship was established in 1985 to provide assistance to students within the UCO Department of Dance. Eligibility Student in the Department of Dance Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
